professional_summary: Experienced Systems Administrator with expertise in active directory management, VMware configuration, and ERP system optimization. Proven track record in network infrastructure setup, database analysis, and troubleshooting.

key_responsibilities: Configuring and optimizing active directory settings for secure user access
Setting up and maintaining VMware environments for disaster recovery
Database management and optimization for quality assurance processes
Implementing SQL queries for data analysis and reporting
Troubleshooting network issues impacting laboratory operations
Preparing and shipping network equipment to multiple sites
Configuring VLANs and upgrading network switches using TFTP servers
Administering inventory management systems with MS Excel
Maintaining and updating microbiology department databases with critical data
Performing accurate data entry for up to 50 documents daily
Creating reports using SQL queries for quality assurance purposes

technical_skills:
System Administrator",
            "Active Directory Management",

            "Database Analysis",
